links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..600
maple: g:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(b((i-1)$2), j)*g(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(g(i$2), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> g(n, n):seq(a(n), n=0..40); # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 20 2013
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1998
